course_description: This course focuses on the physiology and pathology of the adult, neonate, infant and pediatric cardiovascular and hematological systems. Surgical approaches to cardiovascular repair will be emphasized within the context of technological management of CPB and life sustaining support.
sections: Class Nbr: 5253, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 10a-12:50p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
